backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, suppliers, products, orders, carts, and Stripe checkout integration with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI redesign, dashboard header, onboarding cards, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing frontend files, routing behavior, major components, hooks, utilities, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout and router handling authentication, redirects, landing layout, and global modals.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Unauthenticated access screen with login prompt using Internet Identity.
Admin-only button that seeds demo products via addProduct mutation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, dynamic year, and links including a tracked caffeine.ai referral URL.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the main navigation bar with auth handling, cart count syncing, and conditional links for users and suppliers.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Landing page footer with policy links and a caffeine.ai referral section using dynamic year and host identifier.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Landing page header showing the logo and a button that scrolls to and focuses the email signup section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a new user’s name, email, and supplier preference with onboarding email prefill.
frontend/src/components/seller/ProductFo: Dialog for creating or editing products, managing form fields, image uploads with previews, and submitting product data.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerDas: Displays onboarding steps for new sellers with cards linking to store setup, product creation, and additional setup actions.
Top navigation bar for seller dashboard with search, menu, notifications, and avatar initials.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerPro: Displays a table of seller products with editing, deletion, and stock update actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin‑only modal prompting initial Stripe configuration, validating input, and saving secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth client, login/logout handling, and context for identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, suppliers, products, orders, Stripe setup, and checkout sessions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, base styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Manages and displays shopping cart items with quantity updates, removal, totals, and empty-cart state.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles cart loading, order summary display, and creates a Stripe checkout session before redirecting the user.
frontend/src/pages/CreateStorePage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing a supplier store, prefilled when editing and submitted via supplier API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, email capture for onboarding, and Internet Identity login initiation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment-cancelled message with navigation options back to cart or checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a payment success confirmation with links to home or product browsing.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists products with search, sorting, filtering, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Seller dashboard showing store info, onboarding steps, and product management, prompting store creation if none exists.
frontend/src/pages/StoreViewPage.tsx: Renders a store view page that loads supplier info and products, displays a hero section, product listings, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/SuppliersPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all suppliers with product counts and navigation options to view products or open the store page.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Exports static asset paths such as logos, banners, and placeholder images.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides helpers for storing and retrieving onboarding email and redirect targets in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Utility functions that return product or cart item image URLs with fallbacks to placeholder assets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architecture notes for the e‑commerce platform.
